page.title: 06BURTON AND BURTON FERRY 1
page.content: The village of{Burton Ferry}is situated on the{River Cleddau}in the county of Pembrokeshire,and is very close to the village of{Burton.}Both villages are central to the main towns. Milford Haven and Haverfordwest are both approximately seven miles distant and Pembroke and Pembroke Dock less than three miles away on the other side of the River Cleddau . The{combined population is only a few {hundred,}including the area around.The landscape is mainly farmland with some woodland.The two main farms in the area are Church Farm and Brompton Park.Church Farm is a dairy farm whilst Brompton Park produces beef and sheep.Both farms grow crops, potatoes being important. Burton Ferry is very picturesque with its views.
